name: Castle Stash
description:
CastleStash is a game where you navigate the castle to find the party room. Win the game by getting to the party room.

Enter a room by tapping the door. Once in a room, you will see the door you just entered, doors to other rooms, and objects. In the upper right corner, is a navigator that tells you what room and floor you are on.
Entrances to halls and stairs are open; however everything else is locked. You must find the key to a room before entering. The keys are hidden throughout the castle behind objects in the rooms. When you find a key, you can go to the bounty room to see where the key goes.

Gems are hidden throughout the castle as well. See how many you can find.

If you feel lost, you can go to the stash, and see the keys you have collected or view the map.
